briefTitle: Validation of a Tear-based Screening Assay for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Validation of a Tear-based Screening Assay for Breast Cancer as a Supplemental Tool to Screening Mammograms
conditions: Healthy, Breast Cancer, Breast Cancer Female, Health Care Utilization, Health Knowledge, Attitudes, Practice, Health Personnel Attitude, Health Care Acceptability
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Validation of a tear-based biological test
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Female over the age of 18 Able to undergo the informed consent process Willingness to comply with all study procedures

Exclusion Criteria:

Currently diagnosed or are receiving treatment for breast cancer Have an active eye infection under 18 years of age
